ComicInfo.Summary:
Santa Claus Is a Killer!: Margaret fears for her life, and the life of her child, when an escaped mental patient, wearing a Santa Claus costume is seen in their neighborhood.
The Bridge Was All Aglow!: Nathan Ramsey wants justice after he receives a lethal does of radiation working at Stanhope's power plant.
The Strange Guide: Three Americans steal a drug shipment and hire Enrique to lead them out of the country.
Trollbridge: Blorgo the Troll is sent to the present and now lives under the Brooklyn Bridge.
ComicInfo.Title: Santa Claus Is a Killer!; The Bridge Was All Aglow!; The Strange Guide; Trollbridge
